website_summaries.verdict: The best single duck call that blends a combination of high-quality construction and accurate sound production.
pros: Uses a triple reed design to improve the accuracy, volume, and clarity of the call
Capable of producing lower tones and high pitches for different types of birds
cons: Duck call can freeze up in colder, freezing temperatures

customer_reviews.title: It's all that it was quacked up to be!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hen mallard duck call. Easy to blow, loud, excellent tone, and very good at the hail, feeding, quack, and come back calls. Perfect for the beginner or intermediate waterfowler! Not sure if it will freeze up in cold weather yet, but this duck call is a value for the sound quality it produces. It is also easy to clean and goes back together to the exact same tone as before. It needs a groove for the lanyard though. I would recommend this call over all duck calls under $40, and it is comparable to the Double Nasty duck call (which is less expensive, but good too).
customer_reviews.author: JG Yahtzee

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Very good call
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick at all. Wet weather or ice cold. It keeps giving you the same sound. I like it. Very good call. I always like the sound of the Duck Commander calls. Own a 1972 and Uncle Si single reed. Both stick after a continuous 20 mins of calling especially in wet and cold weather conditions. You have to open them and dry them every 10 mins. Very annoying for a good hunting day where the birds fly around. So this one saves your hunt. Kept using it in wet weather and ice cold weather and it never sticks.
customer_reviews.author: bahar

customer_reviews.title: Good call.... To NOT buy one....
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This call fouls up so easily now, I can't even use it. And yes, before you ask, I have washed it. NO LONGER RECOMMEND.... I like it. Good call. It does start to foul up after using it for a while and it gets wet with saliva (Like darn near every other call in the world).
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than any duck call I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've owned lots of duck calls during my 40+ years of duck hunting. Most of them I only used once or twice and stopped because they either were hard to blow, didn't sound like a duck, or just didn't feel right. Some were too big to hang around your neck for hours on end. They would actually get in the way when the guns came up. Nothing like smacking yourself in the face with a call when your about to blow a nice fat mallard out of the sky! This one is just fine. It's small, waterproof, and sounds like a duck right outta the box. Can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Sounding Duck Call
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of duck calls and this is one of my favorites, as it has that sweet spot sound that seems to bring in more ducks on a regular basis. So easy to blow that my 2 year old can call them in and very simple to adjust tone and volume for different activities or species. Feed calls and attractor calling roll out easy with a little practice, check YouTube for Duck Commander and they will show you how. Best thing I like about this, besides the price, is it is super simple to disassemble, clean and put back together. Blows great wet or dry and will be on my lanyard for quite a few more seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kollman

customer_reviews.title: No lanyard strap spot
customer_reviews.text: Call sounds ok I hate how they don’t have a place for a lanyard strap it’s easy to learn on But I like a fatter call in my hand vs a skinnier one like this
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Duck Call that works
customer_reviews.text: It's a duck call. I blew in it. It made a duck sound. Ducks came. I'm happy happy happy. Dinner was served. Dressed the ducks in a honey glaze. Had some salad with my duck. Drank a cup of water. Repeated the process the following day. Made duck noises and ducks came. Good call.
customer_reviews.author: Rich L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to blow and authentic sound!
customer_reviews.text: Once this call came I spent a little bit of time practicing with it in the house (I'm sure I drove the neighbors crazy). This call was very easy to blow out of the package and created a sound that sounded just like a duck was in the house! This was the only call I took for opening duck season and the result was great! I was able to call some ducks in and was also able to turn some around. Very happy with this call! I'm not sure you will find much better value out of a duck call than this one.
customer_reviews.author: C-Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Needs better lanyard attachment points
customer_reviews.text: I bought this call and really like it. It’s the only Duck Commander thing I own. Don’t like the reality crap. It blows easy and make the duck sound I want. Inexpensive enough to not feel bad about losing it in the slough by accident. I wish it had better grooves for a lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: HeyBob

customer_reviews.title: Works great let's see if he gets a duck
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it he blows in it and drives are dogs crazy so it also works as a dog toy and a husband toy
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great durable call
customer_reviews.text: Great call! I use it for dog training, hunt tests and in the marsh. Only gave it 4 stars because there is no good groove to cinch my lanyard strap to the body of the call. There is on the reed part but I like on both In case the call comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Easiest call I have. 12 yr old granddaughter can work it well after a few hours and listening to duck recordings. My go to for mallards.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brayman

customer_reviews.title: not tuned properly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, one sounded good. unfortunately, this one was not tuned properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner call. No issues in cold or wet weather
customer_reviews.text: This duck call was easy to use and makes accurate sounds. I didn't notice any issues in cold weather or after it got wet from use. I think this is a great beginner call.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Quack
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of high dollar duck calls that you have to work really hard to make sound real. I took this Out of the package the night before going hunting and didn’t use another call the next day. Durable, easy to blow and always ready. I have since ordered more DC calls and love them all
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good but not really
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but fails constantly. If it gets any spit inside (which it's bound to get, obviously) it stops working. When it is dry it sounds awesome though. I haven't used it in cold weather but I'm getting more calls just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A++++++ highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love my duck call. Jase did not lie it is super easy to use and soft blows is all u need for sound. Im a big duck dynesty fan so thats why i got one. Will be ordering more soon to add to this one !! Thanks you super happy and luv the call
customer_reviews.author: Jesus lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best call I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best duck call I have ever used. Not a feeder but kills the greeting call. Super easy to use. I'm embarrassed at how much money I have spent on calls before finding this one...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First duck call and found it very easy to use and great sounds from it
customer_reviews.author: steve hartley

customer_reviews.title: Son-in-Law Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I know zero about duck calls, but after reading the reviews, this is the one I purchased for my son-in-law, an avid hunter since childhood. He loves it and even gave us a demonstration immediately upon opening his Christmas present. When your son-in-law is a hunter, you get "live music" at your Christmas party. The gift was very well received and I thank everyone for the reviews because you made a happy moment happen.
customer_reviews.author: CrochetKim

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sounding call for the first 15 min of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sounding call for the first 15 min of the hunt. Starts to stick and have to clean the spit out every once in awhile. Nice thing is it still sounds somewhat like a duck when it sticks since it is a triple reed and only two of the reeds are sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it relying on the brand and didnt disappoint opening day
customer_reviews.text: First triple reed. Needed a call after I have misplaced mine during my move. Ordered it relying on the brand and didnt disappoint opening day. Will probably add it to the lanyard when I find it.
customer_reviews.author: Z13

customer_reviews.title: Nice call but not a great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been calling ducks for 25 plus years and lost an old Olt call in the water. I replaced it with this call. The call is missing a little bit of the low note. Great 'feeder' sounds though. They must be busy there cause it took a little longer than expected to ship.
customer_reviews.author: mike sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sound realistic
customer_reviews.text: Tough to use, definitely don't recommend for beginners. Have had ducks fly in with my other calls, no problem. However this call seems to keep them away. Highly unsatisfied, don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa westad

customer_reviews.title: good value, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use & get a good sound. For the cashish, it seems to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Truthsayer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Sounds Good, Thrilled Birthday Boy!!
customer_reviews.text: My birthday boy was thrilled!! Sturdy little thing sounds like a duck! And that it is a genuine "Duck Dynasty" call made it an awesome gift to him. Is all that it was said to be. I think he's called in a few ducks from time to time at a local lake too...
customer_reviews.author: janejolene

customer_reviews.title: realistic call.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to blow call that my 17-year-old daughter uses when she hunts with me and on her own. Very realistic and effective. A call will never make up for location and concealment, but this helps bring the ducks to our decoys.
customer_reviews.author: manaalaq

customer_reviews.title: full sound
customer_reviews.text: I have heard some really bad duck calls in my day. This one is the best sound I have ever heard. It is so full and complete. it kind of is like that heavy foggy day where sound is dampened, Not with this call. It fills the air with crisp sharp call of the mallard.
customer_reviews.author: kmr

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: Great call. I have 2 in case I lose or break one !
customer_reviews.author: Kevin74

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and was greatly appreciated by an avid duck hunter.
customer_reviews.author: SEB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound, super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've searched high and low for a Mallard duck call that sounds great......My search ends here!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Call
customer_reviews.text: The Duck Commander Tripple threat is the biggest bang for your buck on the market. It is the best affordable call for any caller to use. The triple threat is also a very easy call to learn on and produces a great loud sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanna

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding call but....
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sounding call. IF your in a warm climate. I hunt in MIchigan and it has frozen up every time I’ve hunted with it < 35 degrees. Which pretty much means I can only use it a couple times a year. Other than that, sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hubby likes it....that's all that matters
customer_reviews.text: The hubby is a big duck hunter...spends more time and money playing duck, duck, goose than I care to think about. Gave this to him as an early Christmas present and he loves it. Says it calls them in, sounds good and his buddies want one as well now.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It works awesome! It gives a nice, crisp actually duck sound. They will call in multiple flocks of ducks, who will come right into the money zone!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cox

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, have to know what you are doing to make it sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this call
customer_reviews.text: The sound is true. My husband began using it immediately. He looks forward to going hunting with it soon. Jase knows how to make great duck calls. It arrived packaged well too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: The only call you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof, sounds just like a hen, isn't bulky or heavy, all around the best call I have ever bought. If you never buy another duck call again, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Raspy but good cheap beginner call
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheap call but best call I have for the feeding chuckle this is possibly the most raspy call ever not exaggerating the quack is way to raspy for my taste if you want a good cheap call get the double nasty amazing call for 20$
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: The one I received sticks.
customer_reviews.text: Call I received sticks constantly. Using in a warm, dry environment.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Not an expert caller but can get birds close enough. Seems like cheap plastic but I don't see it breaking anytime soon. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim-e this

customer_reviews.title: Very nice call for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this call. I didn't give 5 stars because I have heard better, but those calls were $100+. I like this call because you don't have to use much air to blow into it like my others. It makes a nice quack sound also.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle James

customer_reviews.title: quacker
customer_reviews.text: what can I say? There are no words for this gift for my husband. Even on display it is a conversation piece for the house. We both love it. Go Duck Commander!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harraden

customer_reviews.title: Calling all ducks.
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this...not sure anyone else did as he kept using it. lol
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Gloor

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Especially when one finally learns to blow it on the correct end...! Good buy! Now my husband is in command of the Ducks at the Park.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Duck call
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jordy

customer_reviews.title: Great Duck Call
customer_reviews.text: Son-in-law very pleased with this gift. Works well, sounds great, looking forward to using for many years to come. Added bonus of being a Duck Commander call. We love the show, and the family!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Jean

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My boy loved it for christmas. I wanted to break it shortly afterwards. Thank you for the good product. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Goodthrust

customer_reviews.title: Duck Call
customer_reviews.text: I love it my dog hates it they should come up with one that is a squirrel call cause if I say squirrel 3x she goes crazy running and barking around the house
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ribarich

customer_reviews.title: Nice tone and good call
customer_reviews.text: Works well, produces a very nice comeback call and an excellent feeder call as well. Not quite as good a comeback call as the Double Nasty, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Duck Call
customer_reviews.text: Very nice call. I would recommend to anyone. I hunt ducks and this call will do the job. Great family to support as well !! love their show and their love for God!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The beat gift for a guy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome gift I could have ever given my uncle. Loved it and it always makes me smile whenever I hear that duck call!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Sukita

customer_reviews.title: The Pied Piper of Duck Calls!
customer_reviews.text: Without any training, I was able to get wild ducks to come running to me using this call! Got to get you one of these!
customer_reviews.author: John Chu

customer_reviews.title: Great Call
customer_reviews.text: Been practicing with this call for 2 weeks now and it sounds great. Can't wait for the season to open in less than a month!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Call
customer_reviews.text: I am new to calling, I have bought almost all the DC calls now. This is one of my favorites, its easy to use, great volume, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: jason oberle

customer_reviews.title: Unreal duck call
customer_reviews.text: The first time out the mallards were coming in with wings set in the decoys now that was a switch.great call
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Duck Commander Triple Threat  Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This was a favorite Christmas gift, it was passed around so that all the Family hunters could give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Julie T

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for the migration
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good to me.. We'll see what the ducks think
customer_reviews.author: Stuart McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Ducks don't pay much attention
customer_reviews.text: I got this for fun, what with 14 pet ducks! I'm not a hunter, and certainly no duck or call expert, but I can make it sound well enough like the ducks. They'll answer it sometimes, but, then, they'll respond just as well if I just walk out toward them. I can also simply make a similar noise without the call that they will usually respond to in a cacaphony. Most times I do just that, and they call back nearly every time I "quack"... especially if they're expecting food!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best multi-reed in terms of function
customer_reviews.text: Great for in close calling, good for beginners and experienced hunters.
customer_reviews.author: keith levi porter

customer_reviews.title: Great call I bought one for myself and had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great call I bought one for myself and had to get one for my brother as well, it's the easyist call I've ever used. I have many other calls and would recommend this one to any first time duck hunter or an experienced one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Duck call
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and works well. Gave as a gift to a first time duck hunter, no problems. Would definately buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a gift, for my son.He is very pleased with the quality. Another treasure for Ducking Season. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Calendergirl

customer_reviews.title: My friends are jealous!!
customer_reviews.text: My friends are jealous about this call and man does this thing bring in the ducks! Does not take a lot of air and it is really smooth and perfect sound. This is my favorite call and Jase Robertson really hit the duck on the head with this call!!
customer_reviews.author: Qwack Smacker

customer_reviews.title: Great Call!
customer_reviews.text: I have several calls. This is a great call and easy to blow. This has replaced many of my other calls. Good all around call.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kathan

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: purchased for a co worker that duck hunts, he was so excited and was quacking in the office on xmas eve. He lovedit
customer_reviews.author: rox

customer_reviews.title: Triple threat is the best duck call.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a duck and was not that expensive. Recommend to all duck hunters and collectors. This is a very good duck call.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Howington

customer_reviews.title: Jase Designed IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's my FIRST Duck Commander Call. I read about this in Phil's book, "Happy Happy Happy, the Life and Legend of the Duck Commander." Me and Jase are the same age and think allot alike. He is my favorite, then Phil, then Uncle Si, then Martin, then Godwin. The story about how this call came about is truly amazing. I'm not a Duck Hunter, not many ducks here in West Texas (Panhandle-South Plains region). I stand with Phil and SUPPORT Duck Commander. That is WHY I bought this call and I plan on purchasing many more.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Sit in my back yard and call ducks on the pond. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: fun gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a duck hunter, I do however love Duck Dynasty - that's why hubby bought it for me and I thought it was hilarious!!! Jase designed the triple threat and they have mentioned it on the show a few times. It does sound like a duck and we plan to use it at the river this spring just to see if it works!!! It's packaged well and thankfully there are directions for using it on the package, otherwise I would not have had a clue!!
customer_reviews.author: AR Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First call I've owned and was super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: luke hofacker

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I am not a duck hunter. I love the duck dynasty show and thought I would purchase one of their product to check the quality. I have other predator, deer and elk calls and compared this is a very good quality. Most of my other calls are wood, but this plastic call is very good quality and it sounds just like the ducks in the area. Plastic makes sense if your going to use it in wet environments as well. Easy to take apart and clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas present for my husband and he LOVED it. Sounds like the real thing right out ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my husband and he LOVED it. Sounds like the real thing right out of the package ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kayla billups

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomended
customer_reviews.text: This is great call, has different tones and super easy to blow by far my best call
customer_reviews.author: Jason young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent call
customer_reviews.text: Excellent call. Low air pressure to high, a great sound. Everything I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but my son loved it even more
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson, but my son loved it even more!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne  Vick

customer_reviews.title: get one
customer_reviews.text: i have about ten different high priced duck call from zink to lynch mob, echo, rnt and so on this is the best on i have never sticks and sounds great with the duck commander line and quality being excellent theirs no reason not to own any of them..
customer_reviews.author: Yes Sir

customer_reviews.title: Overall ok but 1 season use only
customer_reviews.text: Call was out of tune real bad. Went to a local store and told them it was a gift and traded it for another. Second call worked better
customer_reviews.author: JMOO

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: triple threat duck call is what i expected great product great call i will be using it soon.and also very pleased with amazon as i usually always am.call was delivered on time. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: smooth duck ear candy
customer_reviews.text: The first draw of breath thru this call and you know you have something special in your hands. I started practicing with this call in my living room the first night and it has since been with me thru my 40 mile commute to work, at work in the office and by the lakes and rivers during my travels during my day. I LOVE this call and you know...it loves you back. Easy blowing and the most realistic duck sounds you have ever heard.With the time I've had learning its sound (the feeding chuckle is outrageous) Its probably illegal or at least unfair that this call is this good. Many Thanks Duck commanders
customer_reviews.author: treemd

customer_reviews.title: Nice duck call
customer_reviews.text: It's made by the Robertson clan, tested by uncle Si! What could be better. Actually it could be better if it was fall and hunting season was starting up next week.
customer_reviews.author: Andy R

customer_reviews.title: Duck Call opinion
customer_reviews.text: I really like the packaging and the design and colors of the Duck Calls. I would recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice call
customer_reviews.text: This is my first year duck hunting and have tried a few different calls now. Also have been getting plenty of advice from the veterans. This smaller diameter call seems easier to blow than some of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: quack quack!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome duck call! Easy to clean and tune. The Duck Commander guys are on top of their game. Good job boys.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Call
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite call on my lanyard! sounds amazing, easy to blow, and is completely functional when wet. Great call!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bellingham

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: My twin 9 yr old boys wanted a DD duck call and they just love this one. I have to hide it for a bit of quiet, but hey they're happy.
customer_reviews.author: JaMo

customer_reviews.title: ... tripple threat performed just as expected it is very easy to blow and it has a nice raspy mallard ...
customer_reviews.text: The tripple threat performed just as expected it is very easy to blow and it has a nice raspy mallard tone.
customer_reviews.author: ben thomson

customer_reviews.title: another gem from DC
customer_reviews.text: Another gem from the crew at Duck Commander... Easy to use with great raspy sound... I don't think you can go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.author: joe thompson

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit for 13 year old Boy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves hunting and the Duck Commander. However, the price of the products has sky rocketed because of the success of the show Duck Dynasty. It has been very difficult to find a reasonably priced Duck Commander Product. My son was thrilled to get this call for Christmas this year. It works with ease. My son and my husband love the triple reed.
customer_reviews.author: SafetyMom

customer_reviews.title: Best duck call on the market for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hunting guide in Texas and have a few other expensive mallard calls but bought this last year because of the good reviews and wanted to check out a triple reed that actually worked. This call preformed great and never stuck on me even when dropped in the water. I had this in my blind bag as a back up and used it quite a bit I would recomend this to any beginer for a first call or even the experienced caller
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. Lets just say it didn't make it to the wrapping stage. He loved it :)
customer_reviews.author: Murjani

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present. It was just what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY D HAWBAKER

customer_reviews.title: Good Call
customer_reviews.text: The triple threat duck call meet all my expectations and worked flawlessly. Being a beginner at duck hunting this call was easy to pick up and use right out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: triple threat for real.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great call. Very satisfied. Consistent call can very tones with slight hand movement. Three reeds a charm.
customer_reviews.author: harold plaisance jr

customer_reviews.title: nice quack
customer_reviews.text: better than expected. has already put ducks in the sack. For those who call, it is smooth, can be blown loud or soft, and sounds good. thanks Phil ( and my wife).
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it's a keeper. With in an hour five ducks went home with me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Danner

customer_reviews.title: Good call
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use than some other calls I have. Seems solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Henry B. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Am really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got this call as a birthday gift. Am really happy with it. It sounds great. A great addition to anyone's hunting gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this duck call
customer_reviews.text: We live on a lake in FL. I am looking forward to putting this to good use. I am a yuppie girl, looking to turn redneck hunter! Love the makers of this duck call and plan to collect all their products, I also bought the lanyard to keep my collection together. May God bless the Whole Duck Commander family!
customer_reviews.author: Tulllover

customer_reviews.title: It's like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Product very well built. We have used it twice and have had great response. Would recommend purchasing this item if you are looking for a duck call. Great job Duck Commander
customer_reviews.author: Gary

product_meta.title: Duck Commander Triple Threat Duck Call - Classic Series, Mallard Hen Quack, Feed, & Hail Call, Low Gravel Tones & High Scratchy Pitch
product_meta.description: Patented 3-reed design is "pure duck" with a little extra kick—it easily replicates the quack, feed call and hail call of a mallard hen. This unique system replicates these sounds more easily, due to the different combination of reed material stacked together. The result is a pure duck sound with a little extra kick and a system that is easy to clean, tune and operate.
feature_bullets: EASY TO BLOW- Triple reed that's actually easy to use when hunting and great for beginners
PERFECT ALL AROUND CALL - Designed to replicate the Mallard hen in her quack, feed call, and hail call
UNIQUE TONES- Low gravel tones for mature hens to high scratchy pitch for young hens
MATERIAL- Polycarbonate construction made to be tough and durable
Proven Field Technology that is PHIL ROBERTSON APPROVED!
